Title: ScalableIS
Description:
Big data ETL

HomeWiki:
Project Description

A BIG DATA ETL turnkey.

As a member growing in the wave of big data,
not only data management but also data value added.

Do not satisfy with condition we stay.
Hug the changing world and lead the change.

ScalableIS is a distributed ETL framwork.
It takes care of the difficult system "plumbing work",
allowing you focus on the valuable operation event.
ScalableIS runs efficiently at scale on supercomputer with GPU grids.
We adopt F# with enhance of MPI.NET.


ScalableIS supports map-reduce style processing and CUDA style process addressing,
You can keep the familiar parallel coding style you like.
